channel.title: Help me with my server?
channel.description:
i have a runescape classic server.........
answer this u get co owner on it
when i click (run) for run server a black box pops up for 1 or 2 seconds and goes away?
is their a certain JDK i have to have if so pm it to me ty

item.title: Help me with my server?
item.dc:creator: @Zian Zian
item.description:
@Zian wrote:

[quote=“partyharhar, post:1, topic:236733”]i have a runescape classic server…

answer this u get co owner on it

when i click (run) for run server a black box pops up for 1 or 2 seconds and goes away?

is their a certain JDK i have to have if so pm it to me ty[/quote]

get

JDK then install it, then tell your run.bat file where it is installed to. To tell your run.bat where it is installed to right click on run.bat then click edit. Then replace the file path it says with the correct file pathing for your version of JDK.

What it will say:

set PATH=%PATH%;[red]C:\Program Files\apache-ant-1.7.1\bin[/red]
set JAVA_HOME=[red]C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_07[/red]

The red text are the things you will have to put to the right pathing, don’t delete more then what is the red text other wise it will cause issues for running the run.bat

Line one is for apache ant
Line two is for JDK

It should not matter what version of JDK you have.

Read full topic
